channel.title: Comments on: Thom Yorke snubs Sir Paul McCartney’s duet invitation

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description:
What else good in life is there, <i>Tomas</i>? Politics? Food? The opposite sex?
No; I think we're all quite happy where we are.
But thanks for the suggestion.
item.content:encoded:
What else good in life is there, Tomas? Politics? Food? The opposite sex?

No; I think we’re all quite happy where we are.

But thanks for the suggestion.

item.title: By: Thomas
item.dc:creator: Thomas
item.description: You people take music too seriously

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Man. I absolutely love that PJ Harvey track. I wish those two would do an album together.
item.content:encoded: Man. I absolutely love that PJ Harvey track. I wish those two would do an album together.
